sourceOrganization.name: NIAID CSGADP Network
sourceOrganization.description: CSGADP is a collaborative network of investigators with a focus on halting the development of autoimmune disease prior to clinical onset by means other than global immunosuppression with an emphasis on Type 1 diabetes. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/cooperative-study-group-autoimmune-disease-prevention
alternateName: NIAID Cooperative Study Group for Autoimmune Disease Prevention
